name: Roy Tang
text: Also, if it helps, the hypothetical Person A in my scenario is not an ordinary citizen, he is running for public office. I did not mention this explicitly because I don't think it was relevant, I think the same thinking can be applied if you were an ordinary citizen (just that ordinary citizens have less impact generally)

source_obj.text: Also, if it helps, the hypothetical Person A in my scenario is not an ordinary citizen, he is running for public office. I did not mention this explicitly because I don't think it was relevant, I think the same thinking can be applied if you were an ordinary citizen (just that ordinary citizens have less impact generally)
